mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT id FROM ( ( SELECT sdr_id AS id FROM private_msg WHERE rcvr_id = #{id} ) UNION ( SELECT rcvr_id AS id FROM private_msg WHERE sdr_id = #{id} ) ) AS a
